sourcesContent:
import {React, useState} from 'react' import Pic from '../assets/Tiger.jpg' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify' import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css' const CardDetailItem = ({show, close, data}) => { const [location, setLocation] = useState() const handleLocationChange = (e) => { setLocation(e.target.value) } const notify = (msg) => toast.error(msg, { position: "top-center", autoClose: 5000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true, progress: undefined, theme: "colored", }); const addLocation = () => { const existingLocation = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(location)) || [] for (const location in existingLocation) { if (existingLocation[location] === data.name) { notify('Character already exist in another location') return } } existingLocation.push(data.name) localStorage.setItem(location, JSON.stringify(existingLocation)) close() } return ( Detail Character

{data.name}

Status : Alive

Species : Human

Location : Earth (Replacement Dimension)

 ) } export default CardDetailItem
